channel.title: Ipods,really worth it?
channel.description: Hi there. Now the question i pose to you is "Ipods,are they really worth it?" Why am i asking this you may ask.Well today on msn. My friend was talking to me,seeing i'm around the age of 13 (13 in acouple of weeks so i'm getting used to it :|) my friends have not evolved yet. [b]Here's how the conversation went; tridogs is sending you Love.m4p Cancled. James Wishart says: What the fuck is a m4p? Tridogs says: lyk a ipod tang James Wishart says: Don't have a "Ipod tang" Tridogs says: u no ipod?shame shame -I got pissed off here.He knows i can't afford a ipod- James Wishart says: *beats rocks together* me got no ipod.u like ipod? ipod bad! Ohhhh fire. Tridgos says lmao James Wishart says: I have a computer.I don't need a danmed Ipod. tidogs says: you can't take computers everywhere tridogs says: ohhhh laptop James wishart says: What's so good about ipods? Tridogs says: Evertang.[/b] It brought up something in my mind.[b]What is so good about them?[/b] Well.Let us see [size=20pt]MEMORY[/size] Ipods: -80 gb limit Computers: -250gb limit (changes all the time) Now.Why would i wont 80gb worth of songs or videos.If i wanted that i'd fucking buy a whole computer dedicated to Music and videos.Also.How come you can only use spesfic (sp?) types of video and music formats.Tobad if your music collecting wasn't new music (2002 up).No Ac Dc for you :'( [size=20pt]VIDEO[/size] Also Ipods can play videos.There's one advantage with this; You can littertaly take your pornn anywhere now.Fun lets get caught by the police with porn people. Also lets offer them a doobie.Or too. [size=20pt]MUSIC[/size] Also the music always fucks up.Why must a $100+ machine stuff up everyday -.- Doesnt Apple learn.Microsoft's already skrewing us over.But atleast there music players work :| I mean.Just go get youer computer custom built for the price of a ipod shuffle and it'll work better. [size=20pt]"PORTABLITY"[/size] Hey sure you can carry around your Ipod.But carry around a Ipod is like saying to a black person when you are white "Sup my homie Nigger".You're just asking for trouble.I mean.Sure i can not carry it around but how am i going to have the "pleasure" of listening to my own music?Well i can also carry around my computer(least i wont get blooming mugged -.-) or maybe a laptop.But i'd look gay. So it's ethier getting shot at or carry around a heavy computer.I think i'd rather carry a computer :| Well that's it about my rant :| But i'd like you to discuss.

item.title: Ipods,really worth it?
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

I have an iPod, it’s more like a gimic. It’s fun for a month or two, but I have a laptop, and I like it alot. I believe my iPod was around $300, and my laptop now, is $400. It does fine, with plenty of memory. It’s ok, but if you get it, get a mini or a nano, and don’t let anyone see it…

Borat:

I have iPod video. My neighbor have iPod mini, but everybody know mini for girls

It’s not, although, it’s cheaper. And easier. Just keep it in your pocket with your ear buds through your shirt.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipods,really worth it?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

They are only good on the go. But then again Mp3’s which are cheaper are also just as good. But then again Walkman’s are twice as better then both. Just need to buy the CD’s.

Ipods are amazing and I bought one. Yes, they are extremely over-expensive (especially all the accesories) but they are really convienient so I bought one anyways lol. It depends on how often you use it

item.description:
@MidGuardian wrote:

Uniqueness

iPod’s have a place to put lyrics. Some Mp3/Mp4’s dont have lyric uploaders
iPod’s have cases you can put in. Some Mp3/Mp4’s dont make covers.

just some ideas…

item.title: Ipods,really worth it?
item.dc:creator: @Global Global
item.description:
@Global wrote:

PaulT:

I dunno man. A CD has a bitrate of 1411.2 kbit/s, an mp3 file you download from a filesharing network has a bitrate of at most 192 kbit/s probably less. Analog has good thumping bass and is smooth, and doesn’t lose any of the high treble notes.

You have a point. So then maybe it depends on the quality of the song?

Read full topic
